title: One problem
text:
I use Uber occasionally and am generally very pleased. But the thing I have dreaded has finally happened (for St. Pat‚Äôs Day 2024): Uber has used Notifications to send ads!
   I‚Äôve got notifications turned on for Uber. For sure, when I‚Äôm using the app I‚Äôve got to have complete communication with the driver at all times. And I don‚Äôt want to remember at airport in Cold with bags to turn notifications on or off!
   But ads??? If companies start using notifications more and more for That, then you can see the nightmare. I‚Äôll get totally hammered with unnecessary junk. 
   Please Uber bosses, cut out that ‚Äúnew feature.‚Äù Have mercy!

title: Uber Black Canceled Me
text: My Uber black cancels my ride 3 minutes before pickup time that I ordered almost 2 hours before my pick up time. The. The app automatically lets another driver pick up my ride which is not a big deal, but that would put my pickup time 15 minutes later than we ar supposed to be picked up which would have made it impossible for us to make our dinner reservation. So I canceled the ride. What‚Äôs UBER do‚Ä¶.charges me anyway. Even thoug I booked the ride in advance and because the first dodger waited 3 minutes before pick up time to cancel. Normally I wouldn‚Äôt worry about the money and to be truthful I don‚Äôt want the money back, but I‚Äôm sick and tired of terrible service being rewarded.
